column4: Question for anyone... I have 2.5 GB of free space on my Ubuntu system, which I'm on now.. I attempted to do a kernel compilation today for the 2.6.24 kernel, and it used up all 2.5gb completely, ran out of space, then crapped out
any suggestions for compiling without taking up so much space?
if you are going to do like that I would have at least 10GB to comit compiling a kernel
well considering all of the packages it has to compile plus others it would have to download to make it complete
